Docs.summary: Supports looking up culture-specific resources for mobile controls at design time. This class cannot be inherited. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.MobileResource.GetString%2A> method provides access to resources at design time.

Docs.permission: for operating in a hosted environment. Demand value: ; Permission value: .

Docs.param: The name of the resource to search for.
Docs.summary: Returns a string resource with a specified name. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
